summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for various packages sent by J Epstein & Co Inc. It includes multiple entries for different shipments, with specific details about the sender, recipient, and charges incurred. The invoice highlights the operational aspects of the business, including transportation charges and special handling fees.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $463.45 for various packages sent by J Epstein & Co Inc.
Multiple individuals are listed as senders and recipients, indicating a network of connections related to the shipping operations.
The invoice includes specific dates for package pickups and deliveries, reflecting the operational timeline of the business.
There are several instances of address corrections noted in the invoice, indicating issues with package deliveries.
The document highlights the use of FedEx services for shipping, including standard and priority overnight options.
